name.ja: ドレミコード・シンフォニア

text.en:
Apply these effects, in sequence, based on the number of face-up "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters with different names in your Extra Deck.
● 3+: This turn, "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters you control gain ATK equal to their own Pendulum Scale x 300.
● 5+: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls, then, if you have a card with an odd Pendulum Scale in your Pendulum Zone, draw 1 card.
● 7+: You can Special Summon 1 "GranSolfachord" monster from your Extra Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Solfachord Symphonia" per turn.
